assignments.utilization_method: Pinch the closed legs of the tweezers near their midpoint so the narrow tips extend outward, then use those tips to jab or scoop with wrist motions
Pinch one end of the ruler between thumb and fingers, orient it lengthwise, and perform forward-and-back slicing gestures with its long flat edge on the tabletop

physical_object.name: red Shin Ramyun instant noodle packet

assignments.utilization_method: Place the unopened noodle packet flat; thrust the tweezer tips through the plastic wrapper and into the compressed noodles beneath.
Hold one temple arm near the hinge with thumb on top and fingers below, letting the curved end of the arm act as the bowl while performing a gentle scooping lift
Coil the cable loosely into a small pile on the table; weave the curved temple tip between the loops, stirring back and forth through the tangled segments

physical_object.name: clear plastic water bottle with screw cap

assignments.utilization_method: Enclose the bottle’s mid-section with a full hand grasp, lift it, and tip the mouth forward to imitate pouring from a teapot spout

physical_object.name: green round retractable measuring tape with partially extended beige tape

assignments.utilization_method: Hold the green plastic casing between thumb and finger tips, flip it downward, and produce quick wrist flicks

physical_object.name: silver and black Olympus PEN film camera

assignments.utilization_method: Support the camera body with the non-dominant hand; grasp the lens focusing ring with the dominant hand and rotate the ring continuously in alternating directions
